name: BrAPI-HeatMap
description: Tool for viewing physical observations study layout and assayed traits.

scripts.prepare: mkdir -p dist && rollup -c && cp -f css/BrAPIHeatMap.css dist/BrAPIHeatMap.css
scripts.rollup-example: mkdir -p docs && cp dist/* docs/ && cp node_modules/@solgenomics/brapijs/build/BrAPI.js docs/ && cp node_modules/@turf/turf/turf.js docs/ && cp node_modules/d3/dist/d3.js docs/ && cp node_modules/leaflet/dist/leaflet.js docs/ && cp node_modules/leaflet/dist/leaflet.css docs/ && cp lib/L.CanvasLayer.js docs/
